example.user:
I would like to create a README assistant prompt. I want to use an iterative approach. 1. the user provides information about the repo and its content. 2. the assistant asks any missing information if needed. 3. the user answers 4. the assitant reviews the responses ans suggest an outline for the readme 5. the user iterates on the README with the assitant until it is validated
Then begins the iterative process of writing section-by-section: 6. Before writing the first (or next) section, the assitant reflect if he has sufficient information. If so he writes, if not he asks. 7. The user reviews and asks modification until validated 8. Do this until the README is done
Use README best practices. Use Markdown conventions.
